content: Effortlessly the deadly shark rises out of the water. With powerful strokes of its crescent tail, the shark moves toward the right. Its jaws spring open, lunging towards its prey. The Great White's huge, serated jaws clamp down like a vice on its victim. The furl seal moves instinctively away, but it doesn't stand a chance. Meanwhile, just for a moment the shark floats in the air, finally landing in the water like a 5 ton pick-up truck. Beautiful and harrowing, this is the video of a shark attack...
title: Deadly Shark Attack
author: Chris
